apiVersion.description: The version of the Block API used by the block.

name.description: The name for a block is a unique string that identifies a block.

__experimental.description: The name of the experiment this block is a part of, or boolean true if there is no specific experiment name.

title.description: This is the display title for your block.

category.description: Blocks are grouped into categories to help users browse and discover them.

parent.description: Setting parent lets a block require that it is only available when nested within the specified blocks.

ancestor.description: The `ancestor` property makes a block available inside the specified block types at any position of the ancestor block subtree.

allowedBlocks.description: The `allowedBlocks` property specifies that only the listed block types can be the children of this block.

icon.description: An icon property should be specified to make it easier to identify a block.

description.description: This is a short description for your block.

keywords.description: Sometimes a block could have aliases that help users discover it while searching.

version.description: The current version number of the block.

textdomain.description: The gettext text domain of the plugin/block.

attributes.description: Attributes provide the structured data needs of a block.

type.description: The type indicates the type of data that is stored by the attribute.

enum.description: An attribute can be defined as one of a fixed set of values.

source.description: Attribute sources are used to define how the attribute values are extracted from saved post content.

selector.description: The selector can be an HTML tag, or anything queryable with querySelector, such as a class or id attribute.

attribute.description: Use an attribute source to extract the value from an attribute in the markup.

query.description: Use query to extract an array of values from markup.

meta.description: Although attributes may be obtained from a post’s meta, meta attribute sources are considered deprecated.

role.description: Designates the conceptual type of the attribute.

default.description: A block attribute can contain a default value.

providesContext.description: Context provided for available access by descendants of blocks of this type.

usesContext.description: Array of the names of context values to inherit from an ancestor provider.

supports.description: It contains as set of options to control features used in the editor.

anchor.description: Anchors let you link directly to a specific block on a page.

align.description: This property adds block controls which allow to change block’s alignment.

alignWide.description: This property allows to enable wide alignment for your theme.

allowedBlocks.description: This property adds UI controls which enable the user to select allowed child blocks for a block container.

ariaLabel.description: ARIA-labels let you define an accessible label for elements.

className.description: By default, the class .wp-block-your-block-name is added to the root element of your saved markup.

color.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the properties related to color.

background.description: This property adds UI controls which allow the user to apply a solid background color to a block.

gradients.description: This property adds UI controls which allow the user to apply a gradient background to a block.

link.description: This property adds block controls which allow the user to set link color in a block, link color is disabled by default.

text.description: This property adds block controls which allow the user to set text color in a block.

heading.description: This property adds block controls which allow the user to set heading colors in a block.

button.description: This property adds block controls which allow the user to set button colors in a block.

enableContrastChecker.description: Determines whether the contrast checker widget displays in the block editor UI.

customClassName.description: This property adds a field to define a custom className for the block’s wrapper.

dimensions.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the CSS style properties related to dimensions.

aspectRatio.description: Allow blocks to define an aspect ratio value.

minHeight.description: Allow blocks to define a minimum height value.

filter.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the properties related to filters.

duotone.description: Allow blocks to define a duotone filter.

background.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the CSS style properties related to background.

backgroundImage.description: Allow blocks to define a background image.

backgroundSize.description: Allow blocks to define values related to the size of a background image, including size, position, and repeat controls

html.description: By default, a block’s markup can be edited individually.

inserter.description: By default, all blocks will appear in the inserter, block transforms menu, Style Book, etc.

renaming.description: By default, a block can be renamed by a user from the block 'Options' dropdown or the 'Advanced' panel.

layout.description: This value only applies to blocks that are containers for inner blocks.

default.description: Allows setting the `type` property to define what layout type is default for the block, and also default values for any properties inherent to that layout type, e.g., for a `flex` layout, a default value can be set for `flexWrap`.

allowSwitching.description: Exposes a switcher control that allows toggling between all existing layout types.

allowEditing.description: Determines display of layout controls in the block sidebar.

allowInheriting.description: For the `flow` layout type only, determines display of the `Inner blocks use content width` toggle.

allowSizingOnChildren.description: For the `flex` layout type only, determines display of sizing controls (Fit/Fill/Fixed) on all child blocks of the flex block.

allowVerticalAlignment.description: For the `flex` layout type only, determines display of vertical alignment controls in the block toolbar.

allowJustification.description: For the `flex` layout type, determines display of justification controls in the block toolbar and block sidebar. For the `constrained` layout type, determines display of justification control in the block sidebar.

allowOrientation.description: For the `flex` layout type only, determines display of the orientation control in the block toolbar.

allowCustomContentAndWideSize.description: For the `constrained` layout type only, determines display of the custom content and wide size controls in the block sidebar.

multiple.description: A non-multiple block can be inserted into each post, one time only.

reusable.description: A block may want to disable the ability of being converted into a reusable block.

lock.description: A block may want to disable the ability to toggle the lock state.

position.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the CSS style properties related to position.

sticky.description: Allow blocks to stick to their immediate parent when scrolling the page.

spacing.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the CSS style properties related to spacing.

shadow.description: Allow blocks to define a box shadow.

oneOf.description: Defines whether a box shadow is enabled or not.

typography.description: This value signals that a block supports some of the CSS style properties related to typography.

fontSize.description: This value signals that a block supports the font-size CSS style property.

lineHeight.description: This value signals that a block supports the line-height CSS style property.

textAlign.description: This property adds block toolbar controls which allow to change block's text alignment.

fitText.description: Enable fit text support for the block.

interactivity.description: Indicates if the block is using Interactivity API features.

oneOf.description: Indicates whether the block is using the Interactivity API directives.

clientNavigation.description: Indicates whether a block is compatible with the Interactivity API client-side navigation.

interactive.description: Indicates whether the block is using the Interactivity API directives.

splitting.description: This property indicates whether the block can split when the Enter key is pressed or when blocks are pasted.

selectors.description: Provides custom CSS selectors and mappings for the block.

root.description: The primary CSS class to apply to the block.

border.description: Custom CSS selector used to generate rules for the block's theme.json border styles.

color.description: Custom CSS selector used to generate rules for the block's theme.json color styles.

dimensions.description: Custom CSS selector used to generate rules for the block's theme.json dimensions styles.

spacing.description: Custom CSS selector used to generate rules for the block's theme.json spacing styles.

typography.description: Custom CSS selector used to generate rules for the block's theme.json typography styles.

styles.description: Block styles can be used to provide alternative styles to block.

example.description: It provides structured example data for the block.

viewportWidth.description: The viewportWidth controls the width of the iFrame container in which the block preview will get rendered

attributes.description: Set the attributes for the block example

innerBlocks.description: Set the inner blocks that should be used within the block example.

blockHooks.description: Block Hooks allow a block to automatically insert itself next to all instances of a given block type.

script.description: Block type frontend and editor script definition.

viewScriptModule.description: Block type frontend script module definition.

variations.description: Block Variations is the API that allows a block to have similar versions of it, but all these versions share some common functionality.

oneOf.description: The path to a PHP file that returns an array of block variations.

category.description: A category classification, used in search interfaces to arrange block types by category.

icon.description: An icon helping to visualize the variation.

isDefault.description: Indicates whether the current variation is the default one.

example.description: Example provides structured data for the block preview.

scope.description: The list of scopes where the variation is applicable.

keywords.description: An array of terms (which can be translated) that help users discover the variation while searching.

isActive.description: The list of attributes that should be compared.

render.description: Template file loaded on the server when rendering a block.
